categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Unidentified Imperial officer (Boba Fett's Executor escort)

This low-ranking Imperial officer served on the Super Star Destroyer Executor, the flagship of Darth Vader, during the Hoth campaign of 3 ABY. When Vader summoned several bounty hunters to the Executor to help the Imperial hunt for Han Solo and the Millennium Falcon, this officer acted as the personal escort of the bounty hunter Boba Fett through the Executor's corridors from bridge to docking bay.

This officer, although visibly uncomfortable in the presence of Fett, was eager to learn of the bounty hunter's past history with Solo, whom the officer had heard assisted Luke Skywalker in destroying the Death Star during the Battle of Yavin.
